experience.title: Product Senior Engineer - Generative AI
experience.description: Developement of end-to-end Generative AI solutions tailored to industry needs -from research and prototyping to deployment to the Cloud- with a focus on observability and cost-effectiveness.

responsibilities.value: RAG and BI Agents, multimodal LLMs, Multi-agentic patterns and orchestration.
DevOps for GenAI and LLMOps: TDD for GenAI Agents, groundedness and guardrailing, deployment to production, CloudOps, monitoring and evaluation of Agents outputs and performance.

projects.technologies: Python, LangChain, OpenAI API, Azure OpenAI, Pinecone, FastAPI, Docker, Azure Container Apps

experience.title: Environmental Engineer
experience.description: Technical consultancy on remediation procedures in industrial sites across Italy, in compliance with D.Lgs.152/06.

responsibilities.value: Developing solutions for effective collection, processing, analysis and restitution of environmental spatial data.
Project management: budgeting, proposals, planning, and billing. Regular meetings with clients.
Design and implementation of investigation and remediation activities for contaminated water and soils.
Field supervision of technical activities carried out by subcontractors.
Relations with national and local authorities (ARPA, Ministry of Environment, Municipalities).

experience.title: External Collaborator
experience.description: Development of a GIS-based framework for spatial interpolation of PM2.5 concentration data, taking into account the contribution of urban features and their morphology in the dispersion of pollutants.
experience.longDescription: Development of a GIS-based framework for spatial interpolation of PM2.5 concentration data, using real-time data from a dense network of measuring stations and taking into account the contribution of urban features and their morphology in the dispersion of pollutants.

responsibilities.value: Automated processing of real-time pollutant concentration data, using python and GIS tools.
Development of a tool to assess compliance with air quality international health guidelines.

experience.title: Hero Team Promoter
experience.description: Promotion of cameras and brand-activation in selected events in Europe.
